description: To evaluate the performance of the phenol-guanidinium isothiocyanate (P/GTC)-based extraction method in proteomic analysis, we performed proteome analysis from HEK293-F cell and human peripheral blood neutrophil proteins extracted by the P/GTC-based extraction and conventional direct extraction method. Furthermore, the P/GTC extracted proteins were analyzed by 2D-LC-MS/MS.

terms.name: Reference
terms.value: Kawashima Y, Miyata J, Watanabe T, Shioya J, Arita M, Ohara O Proteogenomic Analyses of Cellular Lysates Using a Phenol-Guanidinium Thiocyanate Reagent. J Proteome Res. 2019 Jan 4;18(1):301-308

title: Proteomic Profiling of HEK293-F cell and human peripheral blood neutrophil proteins extracted by conventional direct extraction and phenol-guanidinium isothiocyanate (P/GTC)-based extraction methods
